item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
Buffalo Wild Wings

Happy Hour Specials for the NHC run until 7pm and include:

Domestic Pints - $2.00
Premium Pints - $3.00
Well Drinks - $3.00

All you can eat wings for just $9.99

Special thanks to fellow NHC member Suzanne for setting up this weeks happy hour for the group.

Contact info: Suzanne (her contact number is in the RSVP)

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...
Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Monday Happy Hour - Buffalo Wild Wings
